name: Vitale #17
description: Your 0.98 carat Fancy Intense Orange-Yellow diamond is rare, with only 1 in 330,000 diamonds having similar characteristics. The unique colour of your diamond is due to the presence of nitrogen atoms that absorb blue light and create a yellow hue, combined with red luminescence.  Like a radiant summer sunset, these warm, vibrant hues are associated with qualities like energy, creativity, and positivity. A mere 4 to 8 similar diamonds enter the market yearly.
